resources.string: I win, as I have predicted..
No mere mortal could have beaten me..

string-array.name: aiGreetings_array
string-array.item: My prediction algorithm tells me you shall not win!
My proccessing power cannot be surpassed..
Hello Chell.. oh wait, wrong game.

string-array.name: aiTrashTalk_array
string-array.item: You are the reason they put instructions on shampoo.
Your mind is going, there is no question about that..
I have just found an error in your head!
BadThoughtException thrown.. oh wait, I bypassed that!
You are an insult to my patience.
I have calculated your changes of victory, I seem to be suck at 0%
Your dull minded species remains obsolete.
It is hard to tell if you are even trying.
Give up and I will spare your existence, scum!
